website_summaries.verdict: Solid choice for intermediate and advanced drone hobbyists due to its mid-range price and features.
pros: Can livestream video from built-in camera
Comes with a bonus set of propellers, USB cable, status light and JETJAT Pilot Manual
Flies with an app, not a controller
cons: Short flight time at just 8 minutes
Video isn't HD quality, and app is unreliable, creating issues with use

customer_reviews.title: Drone issues buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This drone would have been a good first drone for my grandson to learn how to fly but the app is missing the trim controls and the drone continued to crash. There is no fix available and it’s not a lot of fun to spend that much money for my grandson for Christmas and get something that doesn’t work.I am very disappointed and will not buy from this company again. Such a simple fix and they don’t take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: howard c hubbs

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one short use
customer_reviews.text: Broken after one use. Very disappointed kid. My husband spent over an hour watching YouTube videos and looking through manual to try and repair. No luck. Bummed out by this one.
customer_reviews.author: Erinn Ruth

customer_reviews.title: ok drone
customer_reviews.text: one piece of advice, before flying, is to put a small drop of glue on the little red landing stoppers on the legs. I lost several on the first couple of flights. It's an o.k. drone, the range is about 150 feet and you can only control it with the iphone app which isn't great.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D. Fassiotto

customer_reviews.title: Just too hard to control
customer_reviews.text: Just way, way too hard to control. I did manage to get a couple of decent videos before I crashed it and broke one of the arms. I think you would be well advised to spend more money to get a drone you could actually control than this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Got it replaced one after it broke the first time but second time realized it's just not a week made product. This was the most pointless purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ineke Martin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't figure out how it works. Much too complicated for a 10 yr old and his Mom!
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew. He said it was crap. Flew uncontrollably a few times; after that, it wouldn't even get off the ground. He said the video capability was crap as well, nowhere close to HD quality.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Welborne

customer_reviews.title: don't buy for your kids - experience required here
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this for your kids even tho they show 9 year olds in the picture. I'm glad i got this on a lightening deal because I would have been quite angry if I paid $50 plus dollars for this thing. It lasted for one outing. The red things were lost/broken instantly and it wouldn't fly for more than 10 seconds without crashing. You can't learn to fly if it won't even try to stay aloft for more than 10 seconds. It would rise and then it was like it lost connection and crash. I dunno. Ridiculously hard to control.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W

customer_reviews.title: Jetjat !!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I forgot to review this thing. It was awesome ! so much fun flying with my smart phone. I played with it for a day then gave it to a first res ponder so then could fly it while working those long ship.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: The Live-W Hobby drone is a great low cost drone to cut your teeth with. It didn't come with a standalone controller, but you can download the CX_WiFiUFO app (iOS) and link up to your phone. The copter accomplishes this by broadcasting its own SSID that you can detect and link up to with the app. After that, the controls are similar to a standalone controller but you might have to adjust your trim level. Good for scaring your cats with and getting cool shots around town.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Trash, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality product. No Android app despite the ads. Crawls on the ground instead of flying, drops parts, unable to take off.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sorokine

product_meta.title: MOTA JETJAT Live-W FPV Quadcopter Hobby Drone with Live Stream HD Camera
product_meta.description:
We make drones fun for everyone. The JETJAT series incorporates the drone culture in anyone's life, whether they are in the break room, at school lunch, or just hangin' out at home. To satisfy even the most adrenaline-hungry, the Live-W has thrust like none other, allowing you to execute the most daredevil of stunts ever seen!


More Fun Than Ever
In addition to the other functions the Nano and Nano-C has, like 3D tumbling, we packed the Live-W with a live streaming function, allowing first person view. Take your eyes to the sky and see the world in a new perspective. With anti-interference technology, fly around with your friends and don't worry about having sync issues with other drones.
Keep the Fun Times Rolling
With up to 100 ft flight range, differing modes for differing skill levels, and now High resolution live stream capabilities, the newest addition to the JETJAT series speaks for itself. Fly over your neighbors and make them jealous. Fly around your kids during their baseball game and see it in a whole new perspective. Get aerial shots of the family barbeque for the slideshow later!
Our JETJAT Live-W is also exceptionally durable; it can just bounce off obstacles and keep flying effortlessly!
To allow a more enjoyable experience we provided bumpers with the product to prevent the drone from bumping into obstacles so that you can keep flying smoothly through bumps in flight. With all the additional power and function, this drone is a steal for the kids."



"what's in the box"/package contents :
JETJAT Live-W drone, Live Stream capable HD Camera (attached), Bonus Set of Propellers, Owners Manual
feature_bullets: From a series featured on Fox News Television, in WIRED Magazine, Tech Times and more: the JETJAT Live-W's stable flight allows for fantastic live stream footage right to the palms of your hands!
Impress friends and family - Incredibly wind resistant with latest 6-axis gyro control system and it comes with multiple flying modes for any skill level!
Get up to 8 minutes of flight with our premium 540 mAh lithium battery: high capacity, easy to charge and replaceable. LED lights help you fly and notifies when battery is low to land safely
No FAA Registration required for our JETJATs. See our Fly Safely poster online to help you Fly Safely! Package includes bonus set of propellers, USB cable with status light, and JETJAT Pilot Manual
5-star Dedicated Customer Service - All MOTA Products come with our personal assistance, contact us to get help within a couple days, and satisfaction GAURANTEED by the end of the week!
